OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD HEALTH AND SOCIAL CARE FOUNDATION TRUST - SUPPORTED LIVING

Desc.entry: Provides 24 hr support for people with learning disabilities in all aspects of daily life: health and wellbeing, financial, social, living skills, social inclusion, advocacy, promoting independence and choice. Has 2 units in service, 102 & 104 Beighton Road. Receive targeted support of 84 hours per week, shared between 4 tenants. Has City Wide Care Alarm technology in place for night time assistance if required. Referral via social worker only.
